short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web3 KOL Insights and Express News!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into the heart of the web3 and crypto universe with BlockExpress, a cutting-edge Chrome extension tailored for the modern digital explorer. This tool brings you the freshest insights and news from prominent Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) of X (formerly Twitter), as well as up-to-the-minute crypto news, all available in English and Chinese. Customize your experience by subscribing to your preferred KOLs and news channels, ensuring a feed that aligns with your interests. The intuitive design of BlockExpress allows for seamless management of your subscriptions, enabling you to add or remove KOLs and channels with ease. Whether you're deeply entrenched in the crypto world or just starting out, BlockExpress offers a streamlined, real-time snapshot of the dynamic web3 scene, keeping you informed and ahead of the curve.
